title: Quotient to a Negative Exponent Property
text: Use the Quotient to a Negative Exponent Property: $${\left(\frac{a}{b}\right)}^{-n}$$ $$=$$ $${\left(\frac{b}{a}\right)}^n$$
speech: Use the Quotient to a Negative Exponent Property:  parentheses a over b,  raised to the negative n power   is equal to  , parentheses b over a,  to the n-th
pacedSpeech: Use the Quotient to a Negative Exponent Property:    a over b,  raised to the negative n power
,  b over a,  to the n-th

title: Application of Quotient Property
text: You should be left with the expreession $${\left(\frac{2}{7}\right)}^3$$
